mapper.select: SELECT m.m_id m_id, m.m_name m_name FROM follow f LEFT JOIN member m ON f.followed_id = m.m_id WHERE f.follower_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow (follow_id, followed_id, follower_id, follow_date) VALUES (follow_seq.nextval, #{followedId}, #{followerId}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE followed_id = #{followedId} AND follower_id = #{followerId}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Follow WHERE FOLLOWED_ID = #{memberId}) AS followerCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Follow WHERE FOLLOWER_ID = #{memberId}) AS followedCnt FROM DUAL
